verses.verse: Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; The gate <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> that looks <S%H6437><s%> toward the east <S%H6921><s%> shall be shut <S%H5462><s%> the six <S%H8337><s%> working <S%H4639><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; but on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> it shall be opened <S%H6605><s%>, and in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the new moon <S%H2320><s%> it shall be opened <S%H6605><s%>.

And the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of that gate <S%H8179><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%>, and shall stand <S%H5975><s%> by the post <S%H4201><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> his burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, and he shall worship <S%H7812><s%> at the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>: then he shall go forth <S%H3318><s%>; but the gate <S%H8179><s%> shall not be shut <S%H5462><s%> until the evening <S%H6153><s%>.

Likewise the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall worship <S%H7812><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of this gate <S%H8179><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> and in the new moons <S%H2320><s%>.

And the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> that the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be six <S%H8337><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>, and a ram <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>.

And the food offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be a ephah <S%H374><s%> for a ram <S%H352><s%>, and the food offering <S%H4503><s%> for the lambs <S%H3532><s%> as he shall be able <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H4991><s%>, and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to a ephah <S%H374><s%>.

And in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the new moon <S%H2320><s%> it shall be a young <S%H1121><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>, and six <S%H8337><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>, and a ram <S%H352><s%>: they shall be without blemish <S%H8549><s%>.

And he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a food offering <S%H4503><s%>, an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and an ephah <S%H374><s%> for a ram <S%H352><s%>, and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%> according as his hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be able <S%H5381><s%> to <S%H1969><s%>, and a hin of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah <S%H374><s%>.

And when the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%>, he shall go <S%H935><s%> in by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of that gate <S%H8179><s%>, and he shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> by the way there <S%H1870><s%>.

But when the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the solemn feasts <S%H4150><s%>, he that enters <S%H935><s%> in by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> shall go out <S%H3318><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>; and he that enters <S%H935><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>: he shall not return <S%H7725><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> by which he came in <S%H935><s%>, but shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> through the opposite gate <S%H5226><s%>.
And the prince <S%H5387><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them <S%H935><s%>, when they go in, shall go in <S%H935><s%>; and when they go forth <S%H3318><s%>, shall go forth <S%H3318><s%>.

And in the feasts <S%H2282><s%> and in the solemnities <S%H4150><s%> the food offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be an ephah <S%H374><s%> to a bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and an ephah <S%H374><s%> to a ram <S%H352><s%>, and to the lambs <S%H3532><s%> as he is able <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H4991><s%>, and a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> to an ephah <S%H374><s%>.

Now when the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a voluntary <S%H5071><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> or peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> voluntarily <S%H5071><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, one shall then open <S%H6605><s%> him the gate <S%H8179><s%> that looks <S%H6437><s%> toward the east <S%H6921><s%>, and he shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> his burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, as he did <S%H6213><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>: then he shall go forth <S%H3318><s%>; and after <S%H310><s%> his going forth <S%H3318><s%> one shall shut <S%H5462><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%>.

You shall daily <S%H3117><s%> prepare <S%H6213><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of a lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>: you shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> it every <S%H1242><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%>.

And you shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> a food offering <S%H4503><s%> for it every morning <S%H1242><s%>, the sixth part <S%H8345><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%>, and the third part <S%H7992><s%> of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>, to temper with <S%H7450><s%> the fine flour <S%H5560><s%>; a food offering <S%H4503><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> ordinance <S%H2708><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus shall they prepare <S%H6213><s%> the lamb <S%H3532><s%>, and the food offering <S%H4503><s%>, and the oil <S%H8081><s%>, every morning <S%H1242><s%> for a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; If the prince <S%H5387><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> a gift <S%H4979><s%> unto any <S%H376><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> there shall be his sons <S%H1121><s%>'; it shall be their possession <S%H272><s%> by inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

But if he give <S%H5414><s%> a gift <S%H4979><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of his servants <S%H5650><s%>, then it shall be his to the year <S%H8141><s%> of liberty <S%H1865><s%>; after it shall return <S%H7725><s%> to the prince <S%H5387><s%>: but his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> shall be his sons <S%H1121><s%>' for them.

Moreover the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall not take <S%H3947><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>'s inheritance <S%H5159><s%> by oppression <S%H3238><s%>, to thrust <S%H3238><s%> them out of their possession <S%H272><s%>; but he shall give his sons <S%H1121><s%> inheritance <S%H5157><s%> out of his own possession <S%H272><s%>: that my people <S%H5971><s%> be not scattered <S%H6327><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> from his possession <S%H272><s%>.

After he brought <S%H935><s%> me through the entry <S%H3996><s%>, which was at the side <S%H3802><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>, into the holy <S%H6944><s%> chambers <S%H3957><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%>, which looked <S%H6437><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>: and <S%H4725><s%>, behold, there was a place on the two sides <S%H3411><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H4725><s%>, This is the place where the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall boil <S%H1310><s%> the trespass offering <S%H817><s%> and the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, where they shall bake <S%H644><s%> the food offering <S%H4503><s%>; that they bear <S%H3318><s%> them not out into the utter <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.

Then he brought me forth <S%H3318><s%> into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, and caused me to pass by <S%H5674><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>; and <S%H4740><s%>, behold, in every corner <S%H4740><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> there was a court <S%H2691><s%>.

In the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> there were courts <S%H2691><s%> joined <S%H7000><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> cubits long <S%H753><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>: these four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H7106><s%> were of one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%>.

And there was a row <S%H2905><s%> of building round about <S%H5439><s%> in them <S%H5439><s%>, round about them four <S%H702><s%>, and it was made <S%H6213><s%> with boiling places <S%H4018><s%> under the rows <S%H2918><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H1004><s%>, These are the places of them that boil <S%H1310><s%>, where the ministers <S%H8334><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> shall boil <S%H1310><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.
